overview: Shakespeare's great comedy of dreaming and desire has it all - spellbound lovers, quarrelling fairies, tradesmen who love amateur theatricals.  This is both a deep dive into the realms of the subconscious and a hilarious tribute to the power of the imagination.  The most fundamental techniques of theatrical art feature in a magically inventive staging of a play that is itself a celebration of joy, both human and supernatural.
title: A Midsummer Night's Dream
